titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from International Trade Admin.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Informative report received from the United States International Trade Administration.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/26/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on triethyleneglycol bis(2-ethyl hexanoate).
